text: int main ( ) { int n , r , i , j ; int large ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; int a [ r ] [ r ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < r ; ++ i ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; ++ j ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < r ; ++ i ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; ++ j ) { if ( j == 0 ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else if ( j == i ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } else if ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] >= a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; } else { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } } } large = a [ r - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( r - 1 ) ; ++ i ) if ( a [ r - 1 ] [ i ] < a [ r - 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ) large = a [ r - 1 ] [ i + 1 ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , large ) ; } return 0 ; }
